body.p: 8-Apr-2004: First release (version 0.1) of CZT containing corejava 1.2.0 and parser 0.1 (Z/Object Z parser and printing tools).
8-Apr-2004: Released version 1.2.0 of the core Java classes for Z Annotated Syntax Trees. This release is based on ZML version 1.2.
5-Apr-2004: The Parser subproject got its own web site.
18-Mar-2004: Released version 1.2 of the ZML Schema.

6-Jan-2004: Released version 1.1.2 of the core Java classes for Z Annotated Syntax Trees. This release adds support for Object Z (based on an XML Schema provided by Li Yuan Fang) and experimental support for Z pattern.
5-Nov-2003: The core Java classes got their own web site.
16-Oct-2003: The CZT web site got a new layout. It is now generated using Forrest.
3-Oct-2003: Released version 1.1.1 of the core Java classes for Z Annotated Syntax Trees. This release fixes some bugs from the first version.
9-Sept-2003: Released first version (1.1.0) of the core Java classes for Z Annotated Syntax Trees. These were generated from the XML Schema for Z, by our gnast tool.
June-2003: Mark Utting et. al. presented an XML schema for Z at the ZB2003 conference in Turku, Finland, based on the DTD by Ian Toyn.
Jan-2002: Ian Toyn designed an XML DTD for Z, based on the abstract syntaxes of CadiZ, Zeta and the ISO Z standard.
Sept-2001: Andrew Martin proposed the CZT project.
